com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions.controller

Interface DocumentSessionController

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CorrectionDialogCheckDocumentSessionController, InlineCheckDocumentSessionController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDocumentSessionController, CorrectionDialogCheckDocumentSessionControllerImpl, NullDocumentSessionController

    public interface DocumentSessionController
    The DocumentSessionController is returned to the integration for post-check interactions with the Java SDK.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DocumentSessionController NULL
      The constant NULL is the null object for DocumentSessionController.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMarkingCount()
      Gets the marking count.
      boolean hasReport() 
      boolean isMarkingsDisplayed()
      Checks if markings are displayed.
      boolean isStepMode()
      Checks if isStepMode is on.
      boolean isSupportsStepMode()
      Checks if isStepMode is supported by current DocumentSessionController implementation.
      void recheckSelection(PrepareRecheckCallback prepareRecheckCallback)
      recheckSelection will re-check the selection.
      void removeAllMarkings() 
      void setContextMenuPositionForStepMode(Area position)
      Sets the context menu position for step mode.
      void showReport()
      Show report shows the report of the performed check.
      void step(MarkingNavigator.Direction direction)
      step steps to next or previous marking depending on MarkingNavigator.Direction.
      void toggleMarkings()
      toggleMarkings toggles markings on or off depending on isMarkingsDisplayed().
      void toggleStepMode()
      toggleStepMode toggles isStepMode().
      boolean wasMarked() 

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final DocumentSessionController NULL
        The constant NULL is the null object for DocumentSessionController.

    • Method Detail

      • hasReport

        boolean hasReport()
        Returns:
        true if there is a report to show

      • showReport

        void showReport()
        Show report shows the report of the performed check. Note: It doesn't show the report of re-checks.

      • step

        void step(MarkingNavigator.Direction direction)
        step steps to next or previous marking depending on MarkingNavigator.Direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction you want to step to

      • getMarkingCount

        int getMarkingCount()
        Gets the marking count. This count will be automatically updated if you ignore, edit, etc. markings.

      • wasMarked

        boolean wasMarked()
        Returns:
        true, if marking was performed. This value will not be updated.

      • recheckSelection

        void recheckSelection(PrepareRecheckCallback prepareRecheckCallback)
        recheckSelection will re-check the selection.
        Parameters:
        prepareRecheckCallback - see: PrepareRecheckCallback

      • isMarkingsDisplayed

        boolean isMarkingsDisplayed()
        Checks if markings are displayed. You could toggle this value by calling toggleMarkings(). If no more markings are left this will return false.
        Returns:
        true, if markings are currently displayed

      • toggleMarkings

        void toggleMarkings()
        toggleMarkings toggles markings on or off depending on isMarkingsDisplayed().

      • toggleStepMode

        void toggleStepMode()
        toggleStepMode toggles isStepMode().

      • isStepMode

        boolean isStepMode()
        Checks if isStepMode is on. You could toggle step mode by calling toggleStepMode() if step mode is supported by current DocumentSessionController implementation. See isSupportsStepMode()
        Returns:
        true, if isStepMode is on

      • isSupportsStepMode

        boolean isSupportsStepMode()
        Checks if isStepMode is supported by current DocumentSessionController implementation.
        Returns:
        true, if isStepMode is supported

      • setContextMenuPositionForStepMode

        void setContextMenuPositionForStepMode(Area position)
        Sets the context menu position for step mode.
        Parameters:
        position - the new context menu position in step mode, see isStepMode()

      • removeAllMarkings

        void removeAllMarkings()
